My Projects

My University Projects

Employee Database API

Python - SQlite3 - API

An employee database system with funcionality for: multiple search queries, multi-layer menu, auto-creation of employee ID numbers and company emails, update of all employee attributes, deletion of records. Awarded a grade of 95%.

SRPN Calculator

Python - TDD - RegEx

Given access to a legacy system Saturated Reverse Polish Notation calculator and no code or documentation, the challenge was to investigate the functionality of the calculator by trial and error, with the aim of replicating as much of the functionality as possible. Awarded a grade of 80%.

ConnectFour with Bot

Java - OOP - Intellij

A classic game of Connect4 but the human plays a Bot. The game was coded in Java and was to be implemented using OOP concepts and design. The Bot is not intelligent and plays randomly, so you should be able to beat him! Awarded a grade of 80%.



My Self Directed Projects

Unbeatable Bot vs Bot Tic-Tac-Toe

Python - AI - Minimax Algorithm

This game pitches 2 'unbeatable' AI agents against each other in a game that can only ever draw. Making use of a recursive search algorithm which finds the optimal next move. It does so by playing every possible permutation of the game and choosing the route of mimimum loss (either a win, or at worst a draw).

AI vs Human Tic-Tac-Toe

Python - Algorithms - AI Agents - GUI

An adaptation to a previous project using the recursive search algorithm, minimax. This application allows a human player to interact with an intelligent bot. The graphical interface was built using the Python module Pygame. If you can win this game, then the bot has a bug!

This Portfolio Website

HTML5 - CSS3/SCSS - Responsive Design

I built this website from scratch to give myself an insight into front end development. Built in VScode using the Node.js library node-sass to compile SCSS to CSS. My aim was to build a clean, minimal UI to allow easy access to my background and skills for prospective employers.
